definition: to arrest and take away
to grab/to catch/to arrest/to snatch/to scratch

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

sentences.english: The act of scratching and rubbing inside your undies is very delighting.
sentences.chinese: 在内衣下抓来抓去的动作的确很爽。

sentences.english: The thief was captured by a policeman.
Of course, the Party seized the Jew as soon as he left the courtroom.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这个犹太人一离开法院，就被纳粹抓去了。
